the gold
rule as the basis of all human conduct
therefore I will never do to another

all my transaction with others not alone

3 I will forgive those who are unjust

understand the law through which
forgiveness or others strength my own

they are mutually dependent if there is

with a few exceptions have no property

morrow and our Lord commends them to our

and beans live by their labor from day

he cannot clothing self with deeds and

independent one capital becomes
necessary men come into more intimate

summarize food to feed those who build

roads must be made and men must be

until we have immense manufacturing

employment does better work because he

fitted and contributes more largely to

for while he is working for others all
others are working for him every member

is a philanthropist a public benefactor

is a friend of labor and essential to

it is the part of wisdom to form a just

it is also true that the conditions of

the butcher has dressed your meat the

oceans had to be traversed Hills leveled

ships must be built railways constructed
and a
vast army of men instructed and employed

in noble the laborer and the laborer we

the work of kind for which he is best

equality in regard to the world's

employment it places the product of all
